articles.author: Rhett Bollinger
articles.title: What else is new? Ohtani makes more history - MLB.com
articles.description:
ANAHEIM -- ﻿Shohei Ohtani﻿ made history again on Opening Day.
Ohtani, the reigning American League MVP, became the first player in AL/NL history to both throw his team's first pitch of the season and face his team's first pitch of the season as a hitter. Ohta…

articles.author: Londiwe Buthelezi
articles.title: From zero to hero: South Africa is hot among overseas investors at conference | Fin24 - News24
articles.description: There was a much more upbeat sentiment about South Africa among international investors as this year's Bank of America Securities annual Sun City Conference.
articles.content:
Sustained high commodity prices, rising interest rates and the credit quality of SA banks are convincing international investors to put SA at the top of their emerging markets list again.
